Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix critical 404 bug in view API endpoint

Fixed the issue where marking orders as ''viewed'' would fail with 404 when no items are selected. The API was using an INNER JOIN with selected_items filter, which would return no results when the array was empty.

Changes:
- Added conditional query logic: use INNER JOIN only when items are selected
- When just marking as viewed (no items), use simple query without JOIN
- Only update totals when items are actually selected
- Added proper error handling instead of silent failures

This fixes the status update issue where orders would never get marked as ''viewed'' in the database.
